comment: Side effects update: chest tightness through day , torso rash/itchiness on day and . There is absolutely nothing else to explain the rash and it does seem to be a (rare) documented reaction. Only a bruise at the injection site though.
amr:

      :snt1 (u / update-02

                  :mod (s / side))
            :ARG1-of (m2 / mean-01
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (t / tight-05
                              :ARG1 (c / chest)
                              :duration (d / day))
                        :op2 (s2 / slash
                              :op1 (r / rash
                                    :mod (t2 / torso))
                              :op2 (s3 / sore-02
                                    :ARG1 t2)
                              :time (d2 / day)))))
      :snt2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (n / nothing
                  :mod (a4 / absolute)
                  :ARG0-of (e / explain-01
                        :ARG1 (r2 / rash)))
            :op2 (s4 / seem-01
                  :ARG1 (r3 / react-01
                        :ARG1 r2

                  :mod (ii / inject-01))
            :ARG1-of (h / have-concession-91)

comment: Two hours later I'm slightly feverish and my arm is sore, but it hasn't been much different from a flu shot. Also, major props to my nurse because I didn't feel a THING.
